1261:12: bāhyārthavādinaḥ kila vijñānamātratāyāṃ santānāntarasattā nopapadyata iti codayanti |
1261:13: tathāhi, ta evamāhuḥ - yeṣāṃ cittamātrameva sat,
1261:25: tathāhi, āgamaḥ śabdātmako vā bhaved vyañjanasvabhāvo vā |
1261:29: tathā sati, āgamādapi prāṇyantaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śakyata iti cet ?
1261:35: sa tu pratipattṛsantāne sannapyupacāratastathāgatasya vā kapilasya vā kaṇādasya vā karturvacanamiti vyapadiśyate |
1261:36: evaṃ sarve'pi bauddhā vācakaṃ śabdasāmānyākāraṃ jñānaṃ manyante;
1261:41: taccānumānaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇorabhāve'pi yathā pravartate yaddarśayitumāha - buddhipūrvāmityādi |
1261:47: sā'sti pūrvaṃ yasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sā buddhipūrvā |
1261:50: yadi nāma bāhyārthavādibhiḥ svasantāne tāṃ buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāmupalabhya paścātparasantāne grahād vivakṣitarūpā dhīḥ vijñānaṃ gamyate,
1261:56: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvā'nyatra tayordarśanād yadi spandanamanumīyeta,
1261:63: tenāyamartho bhavati - ātmani jigamiṣāvivakṣāpūrvayoḥ kriyābhilāpayordarśanāt parasantāne'pi tau kriyābhilāpau copalabhya cittaspandanamanumīyata iti cet ?
1261:69: nanu bāhyārthavāde tu paracittanimittake kāyavākkarmaṇī liṅgatvena svīkriyete,
1261:70: antarjñeyavāde tayorabhāvāt kathaṃ sāmyamiti cet ? evamāha -
1261:71: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatītyevaṃ na matam |
1261:73: antarjñeyavādināpi kāyavāgvijñāptipratibhāsi kāyavāgvijñaptakārakaṃ jñānaṃ paracittasya spandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatīti na manyate |
1261:80: atha parajñānasya kriyāyā anupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet ?
1261:83: na bhavatā kadāpi parajñānapūrvake kriyāvāgākārake jñāne upalabhyete |
1261:88: yato hi, eṣa upālambho bhavatāmapi tulyaḥ ||4||
1261:90: paro'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati |
1261:93: bāhyārthavādyapi paracittaspandanapūrvakau tau kriyābhilāpau na kadāpi paśyati |
1261:100: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata it cet ?
1261:103: yasmādātmanaścittaṃ santānāntaravartinoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ kāraṇatvena na yujyate,
1261:118: ahaṃ vadāmīti ye svacittanimittake kāravākkarmaṇī te svasantāne upalabhyete |
1261:137: antarjñeyavāde'pi svasantāne vicchinnadeśapratibhāsinoḥ kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ samutthāpakacittasya pratisaṃvedanaṃ na bhavati ||11||
1261:139: svacittaspandananimittake vijñāptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittāditpadyete |
1261:141: ye svacittaspandananimittake kriyāvākpratibhāsinī jñāne te cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī ' ahaṃ gacchami,
1261:151: ye bahirmukhapratibhāsinī jñāne te'nimitte iti kinneṣyete ?
1261:156: bhavatu kila nimittāmātrasya pratiṣedhaḥ tathāpi prakaraṇavaśāt spandanamātrasya pratiṣedho draṣṭavyaḥ ||13||
1261:160: yadi vicchinnapratibhāsinī kriyāvāgākārake jñāne spandanābhāve'pi vinā kiṃcana kriyāvāgākāraṃ bhavet,
1261:161: tadā sarvāṇyapi kriyāvāgākārakāṇi jñānāni spandanena vinā bhaveyuḥ;
1261:170: sa tu yato na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittasya bhedakaḥ;
1261:174: atha nimittatvabhedābhāve ko doṣaḥ syāt ? āha -
1261:178: yato hyatra bhinnabhūtayoḥ jñānayoḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsatve na kaścid viśeṣo'sti |
1261:182: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati |
1261:186: tasmād yo'vicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsaḥ sa kevalaṃ spandananimittako na bhavati |
1261:191: tenātrāyaṃ samudāyārthaḥ - vicchinnāvicchinnabhedamanapekṣya sāmānyena kriyābhilāpayoḥ pratibhāsamātraṃ spandananimittakam |
1261:192: yato hi kaścid vicchinno'pi pratibhāsa spandanapūrvako dṛśyate,
1261:200: śaropalaprakṣepaṇāni yantraṃ ca nirmāṇaṃ ca parapracālanaṃ cetivigrahaḥ |
1261:209: etaduktaṃ bhavati - vicchinnapratibhāso'spandanapūrvakatvena na vyāpta iti ||18||
1261:219: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiriti yujyate |
1261:226: tatra yadyevaṃ cintyeta - śaraprakṣepaṇādikriyāviśeṣāṇāṃ pratibhāsāstu vicchinnapratibhāsatve'pi spandanatvapūrvakāḥ;
1261:227: tadanyā vicchinnapratibhāsāstu na tathā syuḥ ? tasmādāha -
1261:240: yato hi yadi kasyacidatatpūrvakatvaṃ bhavet sarvasyātatpūrvakatvaṃ prasajyeta |
1261:244: na hyevaṃ śakyate'numātum - ṃrāgād vadatīti vā dveṣādvā mohādvā |
1261:254: ātmani spandanānupalambhāt sāmarthyādanyatra spandanamanumīyata iti cet |
1261:266: tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam |
1261:268: tathāvipratipannena bāhyārthavādināvaśyamiyamupapattirvaktavyā - tayoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ spandanajanyarūpatvāt spandanābhāve tau na bhavata iti ||25||
1261:273: antarjñeyavādyapi tathaiva vadet - vicchinnapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyarūpatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti |
1261:274: tathā sati nānayoḥ bāhyārthavādāntarjñeyavādayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedo'sti |
1261:275: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yathā bāhyārthavādī parasambaddhakriyābhilāpau spandanajanyarūpatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadati,
1261:276: tathaivāntarjñeyavādyapi bāhirmukhapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadet |
1261:282: kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ vadan yogācāraḥ svapnāvasthāyāmapi tayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ kinna vadatīti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā ||27||
1261:285: paro'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyāvācau spandananimittike iti kinna vadati ?
1261:288: kiṃ tarhi ? etadapi pūrveṇa saha sarvaṃ samānamiti śeṣaḥ |
1261:290: bāhyārthavādyapi svapnāvasthāyāṃ yau parasambaddhau kriyābhilāpāvupalabhyete tau paracittanimittakāviti kinna vadati ||28|
1261:302: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasyārthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet |
1261:310: antarjñeyavādīnāṃ mate'pitasmāt middhena bhrāntatvādeva parādhipatyarahite kriyābhilāpākāreke jñāne jāyete itīṣṭam ||32||
1261:311: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikena saha samānatāṃ pratipādya vaibhāṣikamatāśaṅkyāha -
1261:312: atha svapne'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānānyapi santānāntarāṇyeva iti cet |
1261:314: svapne'pi jñānasyārthavattvāt svapnāvasthāyāṃ yeṣāṃ prāṇināmupalabdhirbhavati te ca sattvāḥ santyeva satyataḥ |
1261:318: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parādhipatyaṃ na ko'pi nivārayet |
1261:320: yaḥ yuktyā āgamācca rahitaḥ sa yuktyāgamarahitaḥ |
1261:325: tadā yogācārabhimataṃ sattvasya tathāvidhaparadhipatyamapi na kaścinnivārayet |
1261:326: tathāhi, bhavadbhiḥ svapnāvasthāyāṃ ye sattvāḥ abhyupagatāḥ,
1261:327: teṣāmevādhipatyādasmākaṃ vijñaptipratibhāsāḥ jāyanta iti vaktavyaṃ bhavet |
1261:328: tena hi yad viṣamatvaṃ yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ tadevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
1261:331: tathā sati svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sapratighatvaṃ sanidarśanatvañca bhavet |
1261:332: tena hi hastyādīnāṃ gavākṣādiṣu praveśo nopapadyeta,
1261:342: svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sadbhāvābhyupagame tvevemādayo bahavo doṣā prasajyante ||34||
1261:343: evaṃ tāvat samānatāṃ prasādhya svapakṣe yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ parihartumāha -
1261:344: etat keṣāñcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni ġyānāni santānāntarāyattāni |
1261:348: keṣāzncid yogācārāṇāṃ mata eva jāgradavasthāvat svapne'pi tathāvidhānī kriyāvāgākārajñānāni parasantānā yattāni bhavanti |
1261:358: devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ supriyavaṇijo vijñaptipratibhāsīni jñānāni jāyante ādītyanena yogipiśācādīnāmadhiṣṭhānāni saṃgṛhītāni ||37||
1261:367: muhurbhavataiva paryanuyujyate - kasmāt bhavatparikalpitayā tayā kriyayā paracittaṃ jñāyate ||39||
1261:374: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittantare'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate ?
1261:375: tasya kāryatvamityādi kriyā cittasya kāryatvāccittasya gamiketi cet ?
1261:376: cittasya tatkāryatvaṃ tu kriyāpratibhāsijñāne'pi tulyatvāttena kriyāpratibhāsenāpi kasmāt paracittaṃ na jñāyate ||41||
1261:378: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet,
1261:381: kiñceyaṃ kriyā sattāmātrāt paracittamavabodhayed ohosvit jñānāt ?
1261:387: na hi liṅgaṃ sattāmātrāt gamakaṃ bhavati |
1261:391: tadā tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
1261:394: tadā tatretyādi syānmatam - liṅga jñānamapekṣya gamakamiti |
1261:395: hanta, tarhi na kiñcit prayojanamanayā paramparayā |
1261:414: spandanamātrasāmānyāṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa lāraṇasya gatiḥ |
1261:419: ata eva uktam - kāryeṇa karaṇasya gati iti |
1261:422: evaṃ sāmānyena kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirdiśya kāryasya bhedamupadarśayitumāha -
1261:433: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ |
1261:440: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate,
1261:451: ādītyanena mukhakāntiraktimādīnāṃ janakacittasya paroigrahaḥ paraspandanādi ca nimittaṃ ceti samāsaḥ |
1261:453: yasya kriyādipratibhāsivijñānasya tadanyasmāt spandanādinimittādudbhavituṃ śīlamasti tat paraspandādinimittodbhūtavijñānam |
1261:455: parābhogaḥ paramanaskāraḥ ādītyanena tatkālabhāvināṃ tadanyapratyayānāṃ parigrahaḥ |
1261:459: evamuktaṃ bhavati - bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ pratyayaviśeṣasya upāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittadudbhūtavijñānavāsanā kadācit vyavahitād parābhogādapi vṛttiṃ labhate |
1261:461: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyāmapi kriyāpratibhāsijñānānāṃ spandananimittakatvaṃ sādhayitvā upasaṃhartum āha -
1261:464: tasmāt svāpajāgradubhayorapyavasthayoḥ kriyāpratibhāsāt cittaspandanamanumīyata eveti sthitam |
1261:467: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syāt pratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana |
1261:472: tadā tat jāgradavasthāyāmapi yujyeta na kadāciyt kriyātaḥ spandanasya pratipattirbhavediti vākyaśeṣaḥ ||52||
1261:485: ālambanaṃ tu spandanābhāve'pyutpadyate, na tu kriyā |
1261:496: yasya vyapadeśasya santi sarve prakārāḥ sa sarvaprakāravyapadeśaḥ |
1261:500: evamuktaṃ bhavati - jāgradavasthāvat svapnāvasthāyāmapi dṛśyākārādayaḥ sarve santi |
1261:512: tadā mahābhramarājñyā avidyāyāḥ sadbhāvāt tadvaśācca sarvāṇi jñānānyarthaśūnyāni jāyanta iti manyeran ||57||
1261:514: tathā satyarthāntaravādahānyā ete'nekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttareṇaikena nihatā bhavanti |
1261:519: yasmārthāntaravādasya aneke avatārāḥ doṣāḥ parihāralakṣaṇenāśakyanigūhanāḥ santyamī anekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ |
1261:526: evaṃ santānāntarasiddhiṃ parisamāpyāvaśiṣṭān durupālambhān parihartukāmaḥ paramatamāśaṅkitum āha -
1261:527: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam |
1261:535: ye ca śrotṛsantānasambaddhavijñaptipratibhāsijñāne spandanasya gamake iti bhavadbhiriṣṭe,
1261:544: nocyate paracittasamitthitavijñaptirūpatvāt tatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti |
1261:549: sā yasya pratibhāsino jñānasya rūpaṃ svabhāvo'sti tattathā |
1261:553: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yasmāt tatra pratibhāsi jñānaṃ paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpam,
1261:554: tasmāt samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti vayamapi nābhyupagacchāmaḥ |
1261:562: yadi śrotṛsantānājjāte kriyāvāgākārake jñāne vijñaptitvena neṣyete,
1261:566: samutthāpakacittasantānājjāte ye kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete |
1261:567: evamuktaṃ bhavati - vaktureva ye gamanābhilāpane kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptīti ucyete ||61||
1261:568: samutthāpakacittaṃ svaparasantānagatayoḥ kriyāvāgākārakajñāneyoryathā kāraṇabhāvo bhavati taddarśayitumāha -
1261:583: vijñapteryadupādānakāraṇaṃ tena te santānāntarasambaddhakriyāvāgākārake jñāne janite |
1261:584: tajjanisambandhena tena hetunā upacārād vijñaptīti vyapadiśyete ||63||
1261:586: na hi śrotā vaktṛsantānājjāte kriyāvākpratibhāsijñāne upalabhate |
1261:587: tathā hi, vaktā śrotā cobhāvapi svasvapratibhāsamanu bhavataḥ |
1261:588: tatkathaṃ te'nālambane vijñaptitvena svasamutthāpakasya gamake iti | tasmādāha -
1261:612: tathā hi, vaktā caivaṃ cintayati - yanmayā kathitaṃ tat śrotrā jñātam |
1261:613: śrotā'pyevaṃ cintayati - yadanena kathitaṃ tanmayā pratītam |
1261:615: ekahetunā samutthāpakena ye sambhūte te ekahetusambhūte |
1261:618: tathāpi tayoḥ ya ekahetusambhūte kriyāvāgākārakajñāne ta ekārthapratītiniyamād vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete |
1261:621: ekaḥ taimirikaḥ dvitīyaṃ taimirikaṃ 'paśya' iti “aparaṃ candraṃ' darśayati |
1261:631: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate ?
1261:637: tasmājjātaṃ kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yat paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkaroti āhosvinneti dvidhā parīkṣā |
1261:647: sa tu tadabhāve na bhavatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ ||65||
1261:652: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittapratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavattadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta |
1261:653: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham |
1261:655: kiñca yadā bāhyārthāvādibhiḥ kriyāvāgbhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ paracittaṃ jñāyate,
1261:656: tadā tasya paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna ?
1261:660: tadā tena jñānena pratipattrā vā kathaṃ jñāyeta ? ||67||
1261:662: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet ?
1261:681: tasmāt kathamanena jñānena tat paracittaṃ jñāyate ?
1261:685: tathā sati tadākārastāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktam |
1261:690: tadā paracittākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktaṃ prāk ||71||
1261:717: kvacit granthe'tena nāsya prāmāṇyam' iti pāṭhaḥ |
1261:732: na hi dhūmādiliṅgājjātamanumānaṃ vahnyādeḥ svarūpasya grāhakatveneṣyate |
1261:739: syādetat - paracittānumāne tasyāvisaṃvāditvameva nāsti | ata āha -
1261:743: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgatārthasya prāpteḥ |
1261:746: taddvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya yadi punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttimabhilāṣavyāyāmānyatrānyatragamanādikāṃ kuryāt,
1261:750: atha vā punaḥ punarvyahāre pravartanamiti saṃlāpādanu gṛhapraveśaḥ,
1261:756: kiṃ punaruttaravyahārasādhanāya prāmāṇyamiṣyata iti cet ? ata āha -
1261:762: yo lokaḥ tanmātrafalaṃ cintayati saḥ tanmātrafalacintakaḥ pravṛttaḥ |
1261:770: tathā pratibhāsituṃ śīlaṃ yasya jñānasya tattathā |
1261:776: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yadā puruṣasya vahnyupalabdheranu dāhādipratibhāsijñānānubhavodayaḥ,
1261:779: kintu kathaṃ tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyamiti cet ? āha -
1261:796: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ te anumīyete |
1261:803: viśeṣastvasyeṣaḥ - tato'pio upaplutāvasthāyāṃ vyavahitādhipatyāt paramparayā udayaḥ,
1261:806: evaṃ vijñaptijñānānāmubhayorapyavasthayoḥ spandanāyattatvaṃ sādhayitvā svapnāvasthāyāṃ vijñaptijñānād uttarakālabhāvijñānāni yathā spandanāyattāni bhavanti tathā pratipādayitumāha -
1261:807: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi |
1261:811: tatra paramparā tvevam - jāgradavasthāyāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat paraspandanādhipatyād vijñaptijñāne,
1261:832: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyete |
1261:834: svapnāvasthāyāmapi yādṛk yāvatkālaṃ paracittasya anumānaṃ tādṛk tāvatkālamātraṃ saṃlāpādirūpo'visaṃvādo'styeva |
1261:838: ta evaṃ vyācakṣate - tatra svapnāvasthāyāmapi kāryaliṅgasya kāraṇe'vyabhicārād yādṛk utpattidharmatayā paramparayā pūrvajñānasyānumānam,
1261:851: ye tu sākṣāt paracittavidaḥ teṣāṃ tu katham ?
1261:855: tadā kathaṃ te yoginaḥ sākṣādvida iti matam ||87||
1261:864: arthasvarūpāgrahaṇe pramāṇatvaṃ nirākartumāha - atha na gṛhyate kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti |
1261:872: aprahīṇaḥ grāhyagrāhakavikalpo yeṣāṃ yogināṃ teṣāṃ tathā |
1261:873: teṣāṃ yat paracittajñānaṃ tad vyavahāre'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam,
1261:880: kathaṃ tarhi tat sfuṭākārakaṃ bhavatīti cet ? āha -
1261:885: yathā karmabalād devādyadhiṣṭhānabalācca satyasvapnadarśināṃ jñānaṃ sfuṭamarthākāramudeti ||90||
1261:886: yadyevaṃ cintyeta - bhavatu bhāvanābalādeva yogināṃ paracittajñānam,
1261:889: te'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ |
1261:891: tat bhāvanābalājjātamapi paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkartuṃ na samartham |
1261:893: yadi yoginaḥ paracittasya svarūpaṃ na jānanti,
1261:896: yogino'pi paracittākārasadṛśena svacittapratibhāsenaiva paracittaṃ jānanti [ iti paracittavidaḥ ] ityevamavadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāraḥ pravartate || 91||
1261:911: tadā bhagavataḥ jñānamapyayathārtha syāditi cet ? āha -
1261:915: acintyo hi yogivaryāṇāṃ tathā gatānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ |
1261:939: tadevaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvārthajñānam eteṣu caturṣu yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam ||93||
